name: Clara
headline: Helping families discover, hire, and manage in-home caregivers
description:
Clara is Deel/Rippling for in-home senior care. We provide an all-in-one payroll, tax, and insurance platform for families to directly employ caregivers, and a marketplace for them to discover and match with their ideal caregiver from our network of hundreds of qualified local care providers.

Clara was founded by two former Uber colleagues who have experienced the challenges of managing care for a loved one personally, and are inspired by the opportunity to apply their tech backgrounds to solving the most widespread and impactful issues in the >$120B in-home care industry. 

Clara's marketplace is currently live in the SF Bay Area, delivering hundreds of hours of care to local families. Our consumer-facing senior-care payroll and tax management solution is live nationwide.

founders.name: Jon Levinson, Founder
founders.description: Reimagining the way Americans find and manage in-home senior care at Clara. Previously product leader at Uber. Tufts 2013.

generated_description:
**Clara: Simplifying In-Home Care**

Founded in 2024 by two former Uber colleagues, Clara aims to transform the in-home caregiver industry, which is booming with over $120 billion in annual spending. Think of us as the Deel or Rippling for in-home senior care. Our mission is clear: to help families discover, hire, and manage qualified caregivers seamlessly and affordably.

### What We Offer

Clara operates two main services:

1. **A Marketplace for Caregivers**: Currently active in the San Francisco Bay Area, families can browse a curated selection of over 750 vetted local caregivers tailored to their specific needs. This isn’t just a name-and-number service; there’s a rigorous vetting process in place, ensuring only the top candidates make it onto our platform.

2. **Full-Service Payroll and Insurance Management**: Our consumer-facing payroll and tax management solution is live nationwide. That means families can directly hire caregivers without the agency markup, reducing costs significantly (we charge just a 15% fee compared to the typical 50%).

### Why Clara?

- **Quality Care**: We thoroughly screen our caregivers through a digital interview process, background checks, and certification verifications. Less than 50% of candidates pass our hiring standards. 
- **Affordability**: Our average cost of care is around $33/hour, with options as low as $25/hour, making professional help accessible.
- **Quick Support**: Need assistance? We can deploy a caregiver in as little as 24 hours—ideal for urgent situations.
- **7-Day Support**: Our team is here to assist families every day of the week.

### Founders' Vision

The founders leveraged their technology backgrounds to create a solution for the common yet daunting task of managing in-home senior care. They understand firsthand the struggles involved, having navigated the complexities themselves, and are committed to making this process smoother for everyone.

### Location and Growth

Based in San Francisco with a compact team of four, Clara is a part of Y Combinator’s Batch S24, where we continue to innovate and enhance our offerings. 

### Customer Feedback

We’re already receiving glowing testimonials from families who appreciate our tailored approach and reliable service. It’s heartwarming to see how Clara has become a vital resource in these families’ lives.

For those interested in streamlined, high-quality in-home care, Clara is the future. We invite you to explore more on our website: [Clara Home Care](https://www.clarahomecare.com).

---

In summary, Clara is your partner in navigating the in-home care landscape—with technology at its core, quality care at its heart, and affordability in its model. We’re redefining care.
